channel.title: MYB
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from MYB, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: The Very Obvious Reason Disney Canceled ‘The Acolyte’ — It Wasn’t ‘Toxic Dudebros’
item.description: There's a very simple reason why The Acolyte was canceled and it had nothing to do with the culture wars.

item.title: The missing file
item.description: It contained some of my best writing. Cogent, clear and powerful. I found it. It wasn’t nearly as good as I remembered. In fact, it was hardly useful....

item.title: How B2B Companies Can Succeed With AI In Customer Service
item.description: Many technology leaders at B2B companies have been hesitant to adopt AI solutions into their customer service processes.

item.title: IT Complexity And The Future Of AIOps Reboots
item.description: In the rapidly evolving landscape of IT, organizations grapple with several significant challenges.
